scripts.browserify: browserify js/main.jsx -t reactify -d -p [minifyify --map main.js.map --output docs/main.js.map] -o docs/main.js
scripts.styles: cp -r css docs && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css docs/css && cp node_modules/prismjs/themes/prism.css docs/css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run html && npm run fonts && npm run images && npm run styles && npm run browserify
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run watchify" "npm run server"
scripts.watchify: watchify js/main.jsx -t reactify -d -p [minifyify --map main.js.map --output docs/main.js.map] -o docs/main.js
